summary: A juvenile judge and a special educator are convinced that they can save the young delinquent Malony from himself and his violent ways.
cast: Catherine Deneuve|Rod Paradot|Benoît Magimel|Sara Forestier|Diane Rouxel|Elisabeth Mazev|Anne Suarez|Christophe Meynet|Martin Loizillon|Lucie Parchemal|Catherine Salée|Enzo Trouillet|Ludovic Berthillot|Michel Masiero|Marie Piémontèse|Luc-Antoine Diquéro|Yannick Courbe|Tiffany Crobu|Aurore Broutin|Marius Guiraute|Liam O'Sullivan|Vincent Lubin|Philippe Mornet|Elsa Claudel|Lise Lamétrie|Zara Lamokhtari|Swan Daliphard|Maher Charni|Djoumé Koné|Brian Gomis|Jihad Lahmar|Kevin Chaib|Hocine Choutri|Alice Houri|Vanessa Robin|Raoul Fernandez|Etienne Diallo|Christophe Ballu|Halim Oulebsir|Demba Cissokho|Jibril Bentchakal|Alexis Liberato|Adam Jdaa|Mahamadou Bakhyayokho|Stéphane Dai|Dany Schoets|Josef Mlekuz|Jérôme Wade|Wissal Yahiaoui|Djamal Zerouali|Slim El Hedli|Dédé Kalmes|Séverine Dorizon|Marie Leroy|Jean-Luc Vincent|Mathilde Lamusse|Benjamin Gerbet
title: La cabeza alta
